unique.title: What Makes Qblox Different
content-old: Qblox is a construction toy made of 4cm snap-together cubes in nine vibrant colors. Each cube connects horizontally, vertically, and diagonally through symmetrical channels, creating structural possibilities that traditional building toys can't match.

Designed for ages 3 and up, Qblox grows with every hand that builds. A preschooler learns to stack. An elementary student engineers structures. A teenager creates architectural art. A grandparent discovers patterns alongside grandchildren. It's play that connects generations.
content: Snap-together cubes that connect horizontally, vertically, and diagonally.
Vibrant 9-color sets spark creativity for all ages.
Jumbo 4cm cubes are safe with **no choking risk**, certified for ages 3+.
From simple stacking to architectural masterpieces â€” Qblox grows with every builder.
